main_definition: To improve or enhance the quality, performance, or capabilities of something by replacing it with a better version.

meanings_and_examples.example: The company decided to upgrade its computer systems to increase processing speed and efficiency.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Enhancing the features of a product or service.
meanings_and_examples.example: She upgraded her phone by purchasing additional storage space for more photos and apps.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Advancing to a higher level or class in status, rank, or quality.
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of hard work, he was able to upgrade his job position to managerial role.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Replacing old equipment with new and improved versions.
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant upgraded its kitchen appliances to provide faster service and better food quality.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Improving one's skills or abilities through practice, training, or education.
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to upgrade her programming skills by taking online courses on new languages and technologies.
